name: Dead Ringer (BloodyEdward, SirCypkowskyy)
description:
You can't strike them.
You can't shoot them.
But you have to kill them.

Think.

Dead Ringer is a small game attempting to mix point and click puzzle gameplay with bullet-dodging. You wake up in an office full of killers and must become one yourself to get out. Problem is you can't attack them directly - you have to use the environment around you to solve deadly puzzles.

The game was made as part of a semester project in Liceum Kreacji Gier Wideo (Video Game Creation High School) in Warsaw.

Creators:

Cyprian "SirCypkowskyy" Gburek - programmer and overall Unity wizard

Sonia Selerska - story and sound design

Maks Barcikowski - sprites

Marcel "BloodyEdward" Dąbrowski - some stuff inbetween, mostly VFX

Music by the glorious Kevin MacLeod
